data.title: UG & PG Courses, Eligibility, Updates - College Admission 2024
data.meta_description: Gauhati University Admission 2024: Gauhati University admissions for undergraduate and postgraduate courses are expected to be announced soon. The application deadline for the 2024 session is tentatively set for July 31, 2024. The university offers a variety of programs, including Master of Arts (MA), Master of Science (MSc), Master of Business Administration (MBA), Master of […]
data.text:
Gauhati University Admission 2024

Gauhati University (GU) provides a broad range of undergraduate (UG) and postgraduate (PG) programs across various disciplines, including Arts, Commerce, Law, Medicine, Science, and Technology. The university functions as the affiliating body for over 350 colleges, overseeing their admissions process.

GU offers programs at UG (e.g., BA LLB, LLB, B.Tech), PG (e.g., M.Sc Zoology, MA Arabic, M.Com, M.Tech Information and Technology), and doctoral levels. Admissions are conducted entirely online. Prospective students can initiate their application process at the university’s dedicated admissions portal.

An application fee is mandatory for all applicants. The fee varies based on the program level: INR 300 for PG, UG, and PhD programs, and INR 50 for Diploma courses.

Gauhati University UG Admission

Gauhati University offers various undergraduate (UG) programs in fields like BTech and LLB. Students interested in applying should have completed their Class 10+2 from a recognized board. The admission process for some programs is merit-based, while others require entrance exams. Further information on qualifying exams required for each course can be found on the university website.

BTech program requires Chemistry, Physics, and Mathematics in Class 10+2 and admission is based on the Assam CEE entrance exam.

LLB program is open to candidates with a bachelor’s degree from a recognized university and admission is merit-based.

B.Ed program requires a bachelor’s degree (BA, BSc, BCom, MA, MSc, or MCom) with a minimum of 50% marks (45% for SC/ST/OBC/PWD) and is based on the GU B.Ed. Common Entrance Test (GUBEDCET).

BA LLB is a five-year program and requires 50% marks in Class 10+2 for admission.

Gauhati University PG Admission 2024

Gauhati University offers various postgraduate (PG) programs, including MA, MSc, MCom, and MBA. Admission announcements are typically released in June, with a tentative application deadline of July 31st for the 2024 session.

Applicants must possess a bachelor’s degree from a recognized university. The selection process is merit-based, with minimum cut-off marks varying by program. The university portal allows for online registration for desired courses.

MA Program:

Master of Arts (MA) courses are available for admission at Gauhati University.

The duration of MA courses is typically 2 years.

Multiple specializations are offered with varying fees depending on the discipline.

Admission to MA programs is competitive with limited seats available at the university.

MSc Program:

Gauhati University offers admission to the MSc course for students who have completed a BSc degree in a relevant discipline.

Specializations include biotechnology, IT, physics, statistics, and more.

The final selection for MSc programs is based on performance in the PG entrance test.
